ModMetaData.name: TribalInstruments (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Zaljerem
ModMetaData.description:
TribalInstruments (Continued)
Original mod by Hansenbansen https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1122870388 If the original author requests it, I will remove this update.
This is my highly-unofficial "TribalInstruments" update, as it has not received an update for 1.3 (or one for 1.2, technically).
Please note: all assembly functionality has been removed, and I have refactored the instruments according to Core/Royalty standards. Unfortunately for some, that means Royalty DLC is now required. Sorry! I don't have the C# chops yet to start fixing up .DLLs. Someday, maybe.
Not trying to step on anyone's toes here; I'll happily pull this mod if/when TribalInstruments is updated.
Adds:
Ranat Ogolupe Conga
All function as standard musical instruments (i.e. the Harp, Piano, etc.)
Credits:
"TribalInstruments"
ORIGINAL AUTHOR: Hansenbansen
Detailed credits:
http://freesound.org/people/manuke (Ranat), http://freesound.org/people/RepDac3/ (Ogolupe sounds) http://freesound.org/people/sandyrb/, http://freesound.org/people/bigjoedrummer/, http://freesound.org/people/krissyeliot/ (Conga sounds)
Creative Commons license included in mod's About folder.
